import {Component} from 'react' import HistoryItem from '../HistoryItem' import './index.css' class Home extends Component { state = {searchq: ''} changeSearch = event => { this.setState({searchq: event.target.value}) } render() { const {delList} = this.props const {searchq} = this.state const resList = delList.filter(each => each.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchq.toLocaleLowerCase()), ) const length = resList.length return (
    {resList.map(each => ( ))}
) } } export default Home
